miot.api

类 DeviceManipulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • miot.api.Binding
      • miot.api.DeviceManipulator

  • public class DeviceManipulator
extends Binding
    This class represents the Miot device's ability, see also Device and Service

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  DeviceManipulator.CompletionHandler
      Callback interface used to deliver the execution result.
      static interface  DeviceManipulator.EventListener
      Callback interface used to deliver the device's event.
      static interface  DeviceManipulator.InvokeCompletionHandler
      Callback interface used to deliver the result of the method invoke on the device
      static interface  DeviceManipulator.PropertyChangedListener
      Callback interface used to deliver the device's property change information
      static interface  DeviceManipulator.ReadPropertyCompletionHandler
      Callback interface used to deliver the result of read the device's property
      static interface  DeviceManipulator.WritePropertyCompletionHandler
      Callback interface used to deliver the result of write the device's property

      • bind

        public boolean bind()

      • invoke

        public int invoke(ActionInfo actionInfo,
                  DeviceManipulator.InvokeCompletionHandler handler)
        invoke the device's action. see ActionInfo and Action
        参数:
        actionInfo - the action information. see also ActionInfo
        handler - callback the result of the action invoked are delivered
        返回:
        0, if invoke process was started successfully

      • addEventListener

        public int addEventListener(java.util.List<EventInfo> eventInfoList,
                            DeviceManipulator.CompletionHandler handler,
                            DeviceManipulator.EventListener listener)
        subscribe the device's event information. see EventInfo and Event
        参数:
        eventInfoList - the events to be subscribed
        handler - callback the result of the subscribe process executed in the xiaomi cloud are delivered
        listener - callback the result of the event are delivered
        返回:
        0, if addEventListener process was started successfully

      • removeEventListener

        public int removeEventListener(java.util.List<EventInfo> eventInfoList,
                               DeviceManipulator.CompletionHandler handler)
        unsubscribe the device's event information
        参数:
        eventInfoList - the events to be unsubscribed
        handler - callback the result of the unsubscribed process executed in the xiaomi cloud are delivered
        返回:
        0, if removeEventListener process was started successfully

      • readProperty

        public int readProperty(PropertyInfo propertyInfo,
                        DeviceManipulator.ReadPropertyCompletionHandler handler)
        read the device's property. see PropertyInfo and Property
        参数:
        propertyInfo - the property information to be read. see also PropertyInfo
        handler - callback the result of the readProperty are delivered
        返回:
        0, if readProperty process was started successfully

      • writeProperty

        public int writeProperty(PropertyInfo propertyInfo,
                         DeviceManipulator.WritePropertyCompletionHandler handler)
        write the device's property. see PropertyInfo and Property
        参数:
        propertyInfo - the property information to be write. see also PropertyInfo
        handler - callback the result of the writeProperty are delivered
        返回:
        0, if writeProperty process was started successfully

      • addPropertyChangedListener

        public int addPropertyChangedListener(PropertyInfo info,
                                      DeviceManipulator.CompletionHandler handler,
                                      DeviceManipulator.PropertyChangedListener listener)
        subscribe the device's property change information
        参数:
        info - the property to be subscribed
        handler - callback the result of the subscribe process executed in the xiaomi cloud are delivered
        listener - callback the result of the property changed are delivered
        返回:
        0, if addPropertyChangedListener process was started successfully

      • removePropertyChangedListener

        public int removePropertyChangedListener(PropertyInfo info,
                                         DeviceManipulator.CompletionHandler handler)
        unSubscribe the device's property change information
        参数:
        info - the property to be unSubscribed
        handler - callback the result of the unSubscribe process executed in the xiaomi cloud are delivered
        返回:
        0, if removePropertyChangedListener process was started successfully
